data.name: World of Warships — German Ordnung
data.detailed_description:
Give your opponents the wurst of it with three different German Navy ships, each representing a unique gameplay style. On top of that, a full day of Warships Premium Account to start you off on the right foot. Battleship Von der Tann, cruiser Kolberg, and destroyer G-101 each come with their own Commander with 3 skill points.

This bundle includes:

  • Tier III researchable* Destroyer G-101 with a 3-skill point Commander
  • Tier III researchable* Cruiser Kolberg with a 3-skill point Commander
  • Tier III researchable* Battleship Von der Tann with a 3-skill point Commander
  • 1 day of Warships Premium Account

If you already own one or more of these ships, you will receive compensation for them in credits:
  • G-101 — 160,650 credits
  • Kolberg — 156,450 credits
  • Von der Tann — 192,675 credits

*These ships are researchable — meaning that they can be earned in-game through playing. This bundle offers to speed up your low Tier research by giving you immediate access to this nation's different ship types.

Please note: The content of this DLC is only playable on World of Warships accounts created on Steam.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*, Spanish - Latin America*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 62 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 62 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11.1
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080
